params.delegate: The wallet to act on your behalf
params.vault: The cold wallet who issued the delegation

params.delegate: The address to act on your behalf
params.value: Whether to enable or disable delegation for this address

params.vault: The cold wallet who issued the delegation

returns.delegates: addresses Array of wallet-level delegates for a given vault

checkDelegateForAll(address,address).notice: Returns true if the address is delegated to act on the entire vault

getDelegatesForAll(address).notice: Returns an array of wallet-level delegates for a given vault

getDelegationsByDelegate(address).notice: Get all delegations for a given delegate

revokeAllDelegates().notice: Revoke all delegates for a given vault

revokeDelegate(address).notice: Revoke a specific delegate for all their permissions
